article_title: Poll: Next president should focus on jobs, health care
article_text:
Anderson, IN (46016)

Today

More clouds than sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Scott L. Miley | The Herald Bulletin

og.description: As a November battle between Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump grows more likely, local voters are mixed on what the next president should accomplish in the first year of office.
